m_szDocTitle: Panasonic & Nomura Real Estate Reveal Smart Town Concept Plan In Yokohama
m_szDocSumamry: Panasonic & Nomura Real Estate Reveal Smart Town Concept Plan In Yokohama April 5th, 2016 by James Ayre   Panasonic Corporation and Nomura Real Estate Development Company recently, along with the Tsunashima Sustainable Smart Town Council, revealed the concept plans for a new “smart town” that will be constructed in Tsunashima in the City of Yokohama, according to reports. The smart town — which, to give a better idea of location to those unfamiliar with the country, will be found southwest of Tokyo — will reportedly feature a hydrogen fuel-cell refueling station, a town “energy center,” and a
